parse.title: List of centenarians (artists, painters and sculptors)

text.*:
The following is a list of centenarians – specifically, people who became famous as artists – known for reasons other than their longevity. For more lists, see lists of centenarians.

Name Lifespan Age Notability
Rafael Aburto 1913–2014 100 Spanish architect[1]
Julian Phelps Allan 1892–1996 103 English sculptor[2]
Topazia Alliata 1913–2015 102 Italian painter and art curator[3]
Manuel Álvarez Bravo 1902–2002 100 Mexican photographer[citation needed]
Max Angus 1914–2017 102 Australian painter[4]
Rie de Balbian Verster-Bolderhey 1890–1990 100 Dutch painter and Olympic art competitor[5]
Will Barnet 1911–2012 101 American painter and printmaker[6]
Harland Bartholomew 1889–1989 100 American urban planner[citation needed]
Ruth Bernhard 1905–2006 101 German-American photographer[citation needed]
Theresa Bernstein 1890–2002 111 Polish-born American painter[7]
Sherab Palden Beru 1911–2012 100–101 Tibetan thangka artist[8]
Sorcha Boru (born Claire Everett Jones) 1900–2006 105 American potter[citation needed]
Frank Leonard Brooks 1911–2011 100 Canadian artist[9]
Duane Bryers 1911–2012 100 American painter, illustrator and sculptor.[10]
John Chessell Buckler 1793–1894 100 British architect[11]
Rose Cabat 1914–2015 100 American ceramicist[12]
Frederick Carder 1863–1963 100 British-born American glassmaker and artist[citation needed]
Marie-Louise Carven 1909–2015 105 French fashion designer[13]
Malvina Cheek 1915–2016 100 British artist[14]
Saloua Raouda Choucair 1916–2017 100 Lebanese painter and sculptor[15]
Huguette Clark 1906–2011 104 American heiress, artist, and art collector[16]
Edna Clarke Hall 1879–1979 100 English artist and poet.[17]
Alphaeus Philemon Cole 1876–1988 112 American painter[citation needed]
Robert Couturier 1905–2008 103 French sculptor[18]
Sylvia Daoust 1902–2004 102 Canadian sculptor[citation needed]
Marianne de Trey 1913–2016 102 British studio potter[19]
Edgar Dell 1901–2008 106 Australian painter[20]
Medi Dinu 1909–2016 107 Romanian painter[21]
Nell Donnelly Reed 1889–1991 102 American fashion designer and businesswoman[22]
Gillo Dorfles 1910–2018 107 Italian art critic, painter and philosopher[23]
Hans Erni 1909–2015 106 Swiss painter and sculptor[24]
Moisey Feigin 1904–2008 103 Russian artist[25]
T. Lux Feininger 1910–2011 101 American painter and photographer[26]
Micol Fontana 1913–2015 101 Italian stylist and entrepreneur[27]
Hannah Frank 1908–2008 100 Scottish sculptor[28]
Katherine Fryer 1910–2017 106 English artist[29]
Reg Gammon 1894–1997 103 English painter and illustrator.[30]
Margaret Gardiner 1904–2005 100 British artist and political activist[31]
Rupprecht Geiger 1908–2009 101 German painter[32]
Léonie Geisendorf 1914–2016 101 Polish-Swedish architect[33]
Temima Gezari 1905–2009 103 Russian-American artist and arts educator[citation needed]
Bruno Giacometti 1907–2012 104 Swiss architect[34]
Karl Otto Götz 1914–2017 103 German artist[35]
Kathleen Hale 1898–2000 101 British illustrator[citation needed]
Ruth Inge Hardison 1914–2016 102 American sculptor and photographer[36]
Bertha George Harris 1913–2014 101 American potter[37]
Carmen Herrera 1915– 103 Cuban painter[38]
Mary Rockwell Hook 1877–1978 101 American architect[39]
Clementine Hunter 1886/87–1988 100/101 American folk artist[citation needed]
Ion Irimescu 1903–2005 102 Romanian sculptor and sketcher[40]
Jao Tsung-I (aka Rao Zongyi) 1917–2018 100 Hong Kong-based Chinese sinologist, calligrapher and painter[41][42]
Elsbeth Juda 1911–2014 103 German-born British fashion photographer[43]
Max Kahn 1902–2005 103 Belarusian-American lithographer, sculptor and painter[citation needed]
Inge King 1915–2016 100 Australian sculptor[44]
Seibo Kitamura 1884–1987 102 Japanese sculptor and Olympic art competitor[45]
John Koerner 1913–2014 100 Czechoslovakian-born Canadian artist[46]
George Paul Kornegay 1913–2014 100 American outsider artist and Methodist minister.[47]
Motoichi Kumagai 1909–2010 101 Japanese photographer and illustrator[48]
Eyre de Lanux 1894–1996 102 American artist[49]
Lawrence Lee 1909–2011 101 British stained glass artist[50]
Ulrich Leman 1885–1988 102 German painter[citation needed]
Frances Lennon 1912–2015 102 British artist[51]
Stanley Cornwell Lewis 1905–2009 103 Welsh illustrator and artist[52]
Leonard Long 1911–2013 102 Australian landscape painter[53]
Trento Longaretti 1916–2017 100 Italian painter[54]
Loongkoonan c. 1910 – 108 Australian indigenous artist[55]
Tamás Lossonczy 1904–2009 105 Hungarian painter[56]
Louis Maurer 1832–1932 100 American lithographer and printer[citation needed]
Doris McCarthy 1910–2010 100 Canadian painter[57]
Harrison McIntosh 1914–2016 101 American ceramic artist[58]
Donal McLaughlin 1907–2009 102 American architect who helped design the Flag of the United Nations[59]
Leonard Manasseh 1916–2017 100 British architect[60]
Ursula Mommens 1908–2010 101 British potter[61]
Alan Moore 1914–2015 101 Australian war artist[62]
Grandma Moses 1860–1961 101 American folk artist[citation needed]
Wynona Mulcaster 1915–2016 101 Canadian painter[63]
Oscar Niemeyer 1907–2012 104 Brazilian modernist architect[64]
Johan Nordhagen 1856–1956 100 Norwegian artist[citation needed]
Whang-od Oggay 1917– 101 Filipino mambabatok or tattoo artist[65]
Tomie Ohtake 1913–2015 101 Japanese artist[66]
Togyu Okumura 1889–1990 101 Japanese painter of the nihonga style of watercolour painting[citation needed]
Dan Ormsbee 1884–1985 101 American architect[67]
William Pachner 1915–2017 102 Czech painter[68]
I. M. Pei 1917– 101 Chinese-American architect[69]
Katherine Plunket 1820–1932 111 Irish botanic artist and noblewoman[citation needed]
Don Potter 1902–2004 102 British sculptor and potter[citation needed]
Mirko Rački 1879–1982 102 Croatian painter[citation needed]
Eleanor Raymond 1887–1989 102 American architect[citation needed]
Edmund Reitter 1904–2005 100 Austrian sculptor and Olympic art competitor[70]
Judith Révész 1915–2018 102 Hungarian-Dutch potter and sculptor
Glenora Richards 1909–2009 100 American painter[71]
Marie Lucas Robiquet 1858–1959 101 French artist[citation needed]
Manuel Rodriguez Sr. 1912–2017 105 Filipino printmaker[72]
Andrée Ruellan 1905–2006 101 American painter[citation needed]
Abolhassan Sadighi 1894–1995 101 Iranian sculptor and painter[citation needed]
Ángeles Santos Torroella 1911–2013 101 Catalan painter[73]
Tsuneko Sasamoto 1914– 104 Japanese photojournalist[74]
Gertrude Sawyer 1895–1996 100 American architect[75]
Marian Cannon Schlesinger 1912–2017 105 American artist and author[76]
Viktor Schreckengost 1906–2008 101 American artist and industrial designer[77]
Bernarda Bryson Shahn 1903–2004 101 American painter, lithographer and widow of artist Ben Shahn
Editta Sherman 1912–2013 101 American photographer[78]
Toko Shinoda 1913– 105 Japanese artist[79]
Koloman Sokol 1902–2003 100 Slovakian painter and graphic artist
Count Louis Sparre 1863–1964 101 Swedish painter, designer and Finnish film pioneer
Olin Stephens 1908–2008 100 American yacht designer[80]
Hedda Sterne 1910–2011 100 Romanian-American painter and printmaker[81]
Franciszek Strynkiewicz 1893–1996 103 Polish sculptor and Olympic art competitor[82]
Dorothea Tanning 1910–2012 101 American painter, printmaker, sculptor and writer[83]
Lenore Tawney 1907–2007 100 American fiber artist[84][85]
A. Hays Town 1903–2005 101 American architect[86]
Jack Turner 1889–1989 100 Canadian photographer
Unichi Hiratsuka 1895–1997 102 Japanese wood carver and leader of the Sōsaku hanga movement
Josefina de Vasconcellos 1904–2005 100 Brazilian-British sculptor
Beta Vukanović 1872–1972 100 Serbian painter[87]
Martha Walter 1875–1976 100 American impressionist painter[citation needed]
Wang Panyuan c. 1908-2017 109 Taiwanese painter[88]
Seema Aissen Weatherwax 1905–2006 100 Ukrainian-American photographer[citation needed]
Richard K. Webel 1900–2000 100 American landscape architect and designer[citation needed]
Martin J. Weber 1905–2007 102 American graphic artist[citation needed]
Clara McDonald Williamson 1875–1976 100 American painter[89]
Tyrus Wong 1910–2016 106 Chinese-American artist[90]
Beatrice Wood 1893–1998 105 American artist and ceramist[citation needed]
Boris Yefimov 1899/1900–2008 108/109 Russian cartoonist[91]
Ogura Yuki 1895–2000 105 Japanese painter[citation needed]
Israel Zafrir 1911–2016 105 Israeli photographer[92]
Eva Zeisel 1906–2011 105 Hungarian industrial designer[93]
Milford Zornes 1908–2008 100 American watercolor artist and teacher[94]

parse.displaytitle: List of centenarians (artists, painters and sculptors)
